author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5563: Favor to shutdownNow in doShutdown as that is the forced shutdown when Camel shutdown itself, and use regular shutdown/gracefulShutdown when stopping. This is for thread pools. This keeps logic as previous releases.
